  • Method Details

    • appointmentTableSetup

      public static void appointmentTableSetup(javafx.scene.control.TableView<Appointment> allAppointmentTable, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Object,Object> appointmentIdColumn, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Object,Object> appointmentTitleColumn, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Object,Object> appointmentDescriptionColumn, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Object,Object> appointmentTypeColumn, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Appointment,String> appointmentStartColumn, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Appointment,String> appointmentEndColumn, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Object,Object> appointmentCustomerIdColumn)
      Sets up the appointment table with the columns and data.
      Parameters:
      allAppointmentTable - The TableView to set up.
      appointmentIdColumn - The column for the appointment ID.
      appointmentTitleColumn - The column for the appointment title.
      appointmentDescriptionColumn - The column for the appointment description.
      appointmentTypeColumn - The column for the appointment type.
      appointmentStartColumn - The column for the appointment start time.
      appointmentEndColumn - The column for the appointment end time.
      appointmentCustomerIdColumn - The column for the customer ID associated with the appointment.

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage stage) throws Exception
      Loads the 'reports.fxml' scene.
      Specified by:
      start in class javafx.application.Application
      Throws:
      Exception

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the controller and sets up GUI elements and listeners. Contact combo box with all contacts from the database. Check for changes in the Contact combo box and update the appointment table view accordingly. Appointment Type combo box with preset options. Month combo box with all months and changes in the Appointment Type combo box and Month combo box selection. Update the appointment count label accordingly. Country combo box with all countries from the database and look for changes in the Country combo box selection, update the customer count label accordingly. Lastly set up the appointment table with specified columns.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • setupContactCombo

      private void setupContactCombo()
      Sets up the combo box for contact selection. It populates the combo box with all contacts from the database.

    • changeContactFilter

      public void changeContactFilter()
      LAMBDA. Changes the appointment filter according to the selected contact. It updates the appointment table view with appointments of the selected contact.

    • setupCountryCombo

      private void setupCountryCombo()
      Sets up the combo box for country selection. It populates the combo box with all countries from the database.

    • changeCountryFilter

      private void changeCountryFilter()
      LAMBDA. Changes the customer count according to the selected country. It updates the customer count label with the number of customers in the selected country.

    • updateCustomerCount

      private void updateCustomerCount()
      Updates the label that displays the customer count for the selected country.

    • changeAppointmentTypeLabel

      public void changeAppointmentTypeLabel()
      LAMBDA. Changes the appointment count label according to the selected appointment type and month.

    • updateAppointmentCountLabel

      private void updateAppointmentCountLabel()
      Updates the label that displays the appointment count for the selected appointment type and month.

    • setupAppointmentType

      private void setupAppointmentType()
      Sets up the combo box for appointment type. It populates the combo box with preset options.

    • setupMonthCombo

      private void setupMonthCombo()
      Sets up the combo box for month selection. It populates the combo box with all months of the year.
